lead_paragraph: The way manager Joe Girardi described it, for weeks Bryan Mitchell was throwing from a chair with his injured foot elevated just to keep his arm in shape down in lonely Florida.

headline.print_headline: Mitchell, Severino Pitch Yanks Past Blue Jays 2-0 for Sweep
headline.main: Mitchell, Severino Pitch Yanks Past Blue Jays 2-0 for Sweep
